label: Archive formats
description: Utilized by file-roller to extract or compress different formats.

exec.label: Install
exec.command: run-as-root dnf -y install cabextract lzip p7zip p7zip-plugins unrar

undo.label: Remove
undo.command: run-as-root dnf -y --setopt clean_requirements_on_remove=1 erase cabextract lzip p7zip p7zip-plugins unrar

status.command: rpm --quiet --query cabextract lzip p7zip p7zip-plugins unrar
